product.title: AMD Ryzen 7 9800X3D - Zen 5 Architecture 8-Core 4.7 GHz Socket AM5 Desktop Processor
product.description: The AMD Ryzen 7 9800X3D processor delivers exceptional gaming performance with 3D V-Cache technology, featuring 8 cores and 16 threads running at up to 5.2 GHz boost clock.

reviews.review_body: This processor is absolutely amazing for gaming. The 3D V-Cache technology really makes a difference in modern games. Upgraded from a 5800X3D and the performance improvement is noticeable.
